item.title: Report: DHS Workers Axed for Funding Migrant Hotels
item.description: The Department of Homeland Security reportedly will fire employees for sending money last week to fund hotels for illegal migrants in New York City.

item.title: Trump Slams Judges Blocking His Orders
item.description: Democrats are relying on judges in the U.S. legal system to dictate what the executive branch should do, President Donald Trump said.
